comments.name: Alexandra laurent
comments.content:
Great learning platform for those 
 who are starting out as a dancer.

comments.name: Robert Lopez
comments.content:
This was one of the best learning 
 
 experiences I’ve ever had. The teachers 
 
 were friendly and gave me great advice.

comments.name: Allen King
comments.content:
I’ve learned a Variety of new things 
 that helped me a lot in my career
 as a choregrapher.
